translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Triad with the Direction in the Paṭṭhāna

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.29. Rūpīduka, Kusalattika🔽Arūpiṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Arūpiṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  rūpīduka kusalattika  arūpim kusalam dhammam paṭicca na arūpī na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  arūpim akusalam dhammam paṭicca na arūpī na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The Section on the Triad with the Direction in the Paṭṭhāna🔽With respect to the unformed, there is no unformed wholesome state that is related to the unformed by way of the condition being a root condition. With respect to the unformed, there is no unformed unwholesome state that is related to the unformed by way of the condition being a root condition. With respect to the unformed, there is no unformed indeterminate state that is related to the unformed by way of the condition being a root condition.🔽With respect to the unformed, there is no unformed wholesome state that is related to the unformed by way of the condition being a prenascent condition. With respect to the unformed, there is no unformed unwholesome state that is related to the unformed by way of the condition being a prenascent condition. With respect to the unformed, there is no unformed indeterminate state that is related to the unformed by way of the condition being a prenascent condition.

original: Rūpiṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā narūpī naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: rūpim abyākatam dhammam paccayā na rūpī na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With respect to the unformed, there is no unformed wholesome state that is related to the unformed by way of the condition being a postnascent condition. With respect to the unformed, there is no unformed unwholesome state that is related to the unformed by way of the condition being a postnascent condition. With respect to the unformed, there is no unformed indeterminate state that is related to the unformed by way of the condition being a postnascent condition.
